en.title: "Christmas For Payatas" Blogs Starting to Hit Cyberspace!
en.content:
It is gratifying to see people from around the world starting to pick up and promote "Christmas For Payatas" of which FE is a major donor and sponsor. This festive season, let us all not forget the poor and the less fortunates of society. Donate generously to the children of Payatas and help pass the message along. Tell everyone to watch the videos!

FE appreciates the following bloggers for helping. A little effort on everyone's part can help bury poverty!
 
Click Blogs Below For Further Information:

• blog.cyberpartygal.com
• mahtwocents.blogharbor.com
• ourhappyhappenings.com
• corrinrenee.com
• handingchao.com
• themediablog.blogspot.com
• demoments.net
